name: COVID19
title: COVID 19
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of COVID-19.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of COVID-19.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent suspected, possible or probable COVID-19, or possible exposure to COVID-19 without a definitive COVID-19 diagnosis.)
